title: R-multiverse package status
text: This website reports the check status of each package on R-multiverse.

title: R-multiverse package status
text:
Production
The Production status page lists the packages staged for the targeted Production snapshot. Packages are staged for Production if they pass R-multiverse checks at least once in the month-long period prior to the snapshot date.

title: R-multiverse package status
text:
Status summaries
The following pages list packages with R-multiverse check issues.

Community issues
Production issues

title: R-multiverse package status
text:
Status details
Each package has its own human-readable HTML page and RSS feed for each of Community and Staging. For example, the polars package has:




HTML
RSS




Community
community/polars.html
community/polars.xml


Staging
staging/polars.html
staging/polars.xml
